Name: Monstre Verte Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with chilled water and set aside.
Separately, SHAKE other ingredients with ice.
DISCARD contents of glass and refill with fresh ice.
FINE STRAIN contents of shaker into the absinthe-rinsed glass.
Review: A drink for fans of Chartreuse and aniseed.
History: Created in 2011 by Jamie Boudreau in Seattle, USA
